item.title: Safari Shortcut
item.author: Haolin Yang
item.description: Some keyboards shortcuts when using safari Navigating Webpages Use arrow keys to go up and down. Use Option+up/down or Shift+Space / Space to scroll quickly. Use Command+up/down goto the top & button. Open Pages in Tabs Use Command+T to open a new Tab. Use Shift+Command+Left/right arrow or Control+Tab / Control+Shift+Tab to move from tab to tab. Use Command+W to close current tab. Use Command+Z to reopen a closed tab. Use Command+Option+W to close all tabs expect current tab.
